text: Topu Barman () is a Bangladeshi footballer who plays as a defender. He currently plays for Bashundhara Kings and Bangladesh national football team.https://en.asiangames2018.id/athletes/athlete/BARMAN-Topu-3005048/ ==Club career== ===Bashundhara Kings=== Topu Barman joined Bashundhara Kings in September 2019. He made his debut for Bashundhara in a 2019-20 Federation Cup match against Chittagong Abahani on 27 December 2019. He scored his first goal for Bashundhara against Bangladesh Police FC in the same competition on 1 January 2020. ==International career== ===International goals=== :Scores and results list Bangladesh's goal tally first. {| class="wikitable" ! # !!
